title: Mass Spectrometer Highlighted in Gas Analysis Catalog
content:
Hiden Analytical’s product catalogue highlights the full range of application-specific systems for analysis of gases and vapors in diverse environments, addressing measurement of samples at pressure from millibars to 30 atmospheres and with sample quantities down to less than 0.1scc. The product range offers dedicated and specialized interfaces to integrate the mass spectrometer with diverse processes. 
  
 
Hiden Analytical www.HidenAnalytical.com, +44 1925 445225
